selected_skills.name: analyze_graph_for_limit
selected_skills.purpose: To determine the y-value of the function f at x=3 from the graph.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use the image hash and x_value=3 to get the y-value from the graph.

selected_skills.name: format_final
selected_skills.purpose: To format the final answer as a multiple-choice option.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use the result of the comparison to return the correct option label.

new_skill_specs.name: compare_y_value_to_zero
new_skill_specs.purpose: To compare the y-value at x=3 to 0 and determine the correct multiple-choice option.
new_skill_specs.outputs: The label of the correct multiple-choice option.
